title: Oregon Firm Recalls Meat and Poultry Ravioli Products Produced Without Benefit of Inspection
summary: Editor's Note: This release is being reissued to expand the September 16, 2013 recall to include an undetermined amount of an additional product (Pork Pelmeni). WASHINGTON, September 25, 2013 Siberoni, a Portland, Ore. firm, is recalling an undetermined amount of raw and frozen meat and...
impacted_products: 1 lb. packages, in 40 pound cases, of “Siberoni” brand Chicken Pelmeni
1 lb. packages, in 40 pound cases, of “Siberoni” brand Beef Pelmeni
1 lb. packages, in 40 pound cases, of “Siberoni” brand Beef and Pork Pelmeni
1 lb. packages, in 40 pound cases, of “Siberoni” brand Pork Pelmeni
